@djeglin @stef @Netlify Our serverless functions use a "zip it and ship it" model to package up deps and deploy them to the infra. But sites depends on their structure and the method of deployment. (UI/CI/CLI) Also getting assets to Netlify differs from deploying build assets from Netlify CI to CDN
